name: OR_IMP
description: The OR_IMP table contains implant information.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: IMPLANT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the implant record.

columns.name: IMPLANT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The implant type category number for the implant record.

columns.name: MANUFACTURER_C_NAME
columns.description: The manufacturer category number for the implant record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The implant status category number for the implant record.

columns.name: SMDA_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the implant conforms to the Safe Medical Device Act (SMDA). Y indicates that the implant conforms to the SMDA. A null indicates that no value is documented. N indicates that the implant does not conform to the SMDA.

columns.name: ACTIVE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the implant record is active. Y indicates that the implant is active. A null indicates that no value is documented. N indicates that the implant is not active.

columns.name: MODEL_NUMBER
columns.description: The model number of the implant.

columns.name: SERIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: The serial number of the implant.

columns.name: LOT_NUMBER
columns.description: The lot number of the implant.

columns.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: The expiration date of the implant.

columns.name: RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: The date the implant was received.

columns.name: RECPT_NOTIFY_DATE
columns.description: The date the manufacturer was notified of implant receipt.

columns.name: RECALLED_DATE
columns.description: The date the implant was recalled.

columns.name: RECALLED_NOT_DATE
columns.description: The date the manufacturer was notified of implant recall.

columns.name: PAT_EXPIRY_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient with the implant expired.

columns.name: PAT_EXP_NOTIF_DATE
columns.description: The date the manufacturer was notified of the patient's expiration.

columns.name: INVENTORY_ITEM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the supply linked to the implant record.

columns.name: INVENTORY_ITEM_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.

columns.name: PACEMAKER_RATE
columns.description: The pacemaker rate of the implant.

columns.name: IMPLANT_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description: The implant area category number for the implant record.

columns.name: PASS_THROUGH_CODE
columns.description: The pass through code used for billing.

columns.name: CHARGE_CODE_EAP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the charge code associated with the implant record.

columns.name: IMPLANT_SIZE
columns.description: The size of the implant.

columns.name: TISSUE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The tissue type category number for the implant record.

columns.name: PREP_START_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the tissue preparation was started.

columns.name: IMPLANT_TEMP
columns.description: Temperature at implantation of tissue.

columns.name: INFECTED_DATE
columns.description: The date the tissue was infected.

columns.name: SURG_NOTIFIED_DATE
columns.description: The date the surgeon was notified about the infection.

columns.name: TISSUE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this is a tissue implant. Y indicates that this is a tissue implant. A null indicates that no value is documented. N indicates that this is not a tissue implant.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this implant. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: IMPLANT_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The laterality category number for the implant record.

columns.name: PACE_INITIAL_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this pacemaker is the initial device implanted in a patient. Y indicates that this is the initial device. A null indicates that no value is documented. N indicates that this is not the initial device.

columns.name: PACE_POCKET_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the pocket location in which this pacemaker is implanted.

columns.name: TEMP_PACE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this is a temporary pacemaker. Y indicates that this is a temporary pacemaker. A null indicates that no value is documented. N indicates that this is not a temporary pacemaker.

columns.name: PACE_PREVENTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The prevention type category number for the implant record. Only stores the prevention type if the implant type is pacemaker.

columns.name: TEMP_PACE_CHAMBER_C_NAME
columns.description: The temporary pacemaker chamber category number for the implant record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The record status category number for the implant record.

columns.name: MANUF_NUM
columns.description: The manufacturer number of the supply linked to the implant record.

columns.name: SUP_CAT_NUM
columns.description: The supplier catalog number of the supply linked to the implant record.

columns.name: PREP_INSTR_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The "source of tissue preparation instructions" category number for the tissue implant.

columns.name: STATIC_UDI
columns.description: The static piece of the unique device identifier, obtained from the implant barcode.  This is the Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) for General Specifications (GS1) barcodes and the combination of the labeler identification code and the catalog number for Health Industry Bar Code (HIBC) barcodes.

columns.name: STATIC_UDI_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of the static unique device identifier, based on the format of the barcode it was obtained from.

columns.name: TISSUE_AUTOLOGOU_YN
columns.description: Stores whether a tissue implant was taken from the patient.

columns.name: EXPLANT_DISPOSITN_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the where the implant was sent after being explanted.

columns.name: SKIN_SUB_USAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: Document how the skin substitute was used.

columns.name: SKIN_SUB_AREA_USED
columns.description: Document the area of the skin substitute used.

columns.name: SKIN_SUB_AREA_WASTE
columns.description: Document the area of the skin substitute wasted.

columns.name: TISSUE_INSPC_RSLT_C_NAME
columns.description: Document result of inspecting the tissue

columns.name: RADIOACTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description: This field will be used by the nurse to document when an implant is radioactive.

columns.name: REPLACE_EXISTING_C_NAME
columns.description: This column displays whether the given implant is replacing an existing implant.

columns.name: TISSUE_EXPANDER_VOLUME
columns.description: The volume (mL) the tissue expander was inflated.

columns.name: REMOVE_BY_DATE
columns.description: Date implant needs to be removed from patient.

columns.name: IMPLANT_VOLUME
columns.description: This documents the volume of the implant.

columns.name: IMP_VOLUME_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Choose which unit to use for volume measurements.

columns.name: SUPPLY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the type of inventory item for the implant. This is used for one-time implants, which do not have an inventory item, to determine what markup table to use for charging.

columns.name: EXPLANT_WARRANTY_COMPLETION_DT
columns.description: This item stores the explant warranty completion date.
